comment: To be fair I took this as a 2 week course, so my experience may vary heavily from a normal person. At first it was a lot of work, until he realized that many people were struggling to keep up with the course load and decided to dial it down a bit. There were several assignments, 3 papers (I only did 2 and still got an A), 3 quizzes and a final.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Coolest guy ever and is very much invested in your success. Just amazing take this guy. Also incredibly funny and makes real conmections with his students. You become his friends in his class.
